name: Developers and App Creators
summary: Developers and app creators are crucial for extending the ALFRED ecosystem. They will use the ALFRED platform to build applications that enhance the system's functionalities. These apps could cover domains like social event management, health tracking, or environmental control. The platform needs to support third-party applications through open APIs and developer tools.

needs.title: Open Platform
needs.description: Developers require an open system that allows easy integration of new applications and services.

needs.title: API Access
needs.description: ALFRED must provide robust APIs for developers to interact with the system and integrate additional services like third-party health devices or social platforms.

needs.title: Documentation & Support
needs.description: Clear documentation and development support to help create apps that are compatible with the ALFRED system.

needs.title: Security & Privacy
needs.description: Developers need to ensure that their applications comply with data privacy standards and maintain secure interactions within the platform.
